categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The main base of the Alliance to Restore the Republic was located on the planet Brigia after the Rebels left Chrellis Base. In 1 BBY, the Rebels were already planning to relocate again when they learned that the Galactic Empire planned to attack the base as the first stage of an offensive code named Operation Strike Fear. The Alliance quickly evacuated the Brigia base and relocated to Orion IV.
